text: Lerwick (; Scottish Gaelic: Li√πrabhaig, Norwegian: Leirvik) is the main port of Shetland Islands, Scotland. Its population was 6,958 in the 2011 census. It also is the second largest port in the Northern Isles and the most northernmost town in the United Kingdom. Category:Port cities and towns of Scotland Category:Towns in Scotland Category:County towns Category:Parishes Category:Shetland
title: Lerwick
